en.Ein Standardraum wird immer als erster R: A default room will be listed first in the room list. On the front page widget booked rooms will be listed with a direct link the default room. If this room is marked as default an existing default room will be automatically unmarked.

en.Label: Label
en.Nur in folgenden Veranstaltungskategorie: Only usable in the following course categories
en.Der Beschreibungstext wird Lehrenden ang: This description will be shown lecturers if this server is selected.
en.Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, werden: If this option is enabled, the related configurations will be applied based on the maximum number of participants in the meeting.
en.Moderierende vor Teilnehmendenzutritt fr: Ask moderator before participants get access
en.Alle Teilnehmenden können die Konferenz: Every participant can start the meeting
en.Opencast wird als Aufzeichnungsserver ve: Opencast is used as recording server. This function is in test mode and errors may still occur.
en.Sofern erlaubt, werden auch die Webcams: If allowed, webcams will be recorded as well. The Opencast system has to support this function in order for it to work.
en.Erlaubt es Moderierenden, die Medien und: Allows moderators to record the session for later playback. The recording has to be started by a moderator during the session.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob die Sitzungsaufzeichn: Specify whether the session recording should be started automatically or manually by the moderators.
en.Aufzeichnungen direkt für Teilnehmende s: Make recordings directly visible to participants
en.Legen Sie fest, ob neben Lehrenden auch: Specify whether not only teachers but also participants should have access to the recordings.
en.Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, ist die: If this option is enabled, recordings are only possible with a correct series id associated to the course.
en.Bei Aktivierung dieser Option können aus: If this option is activated, only moderators can see the webcams shared by participants.
en.Wenn leer, wird die Standardnachricht an:
If empty, a default message will be displayed. You can add the following keywords, which will be replaced automatically:
                %% CONFNAME %% (session name), %% DIALNUM %% (dial up number)
en.Der private Chat zwischen den Teilnehmen: Private chat between participants is restricted, but participants can still communicate privately with moderators.
en.Die maximale Länge (in Minuten) für das: The maximum length (in minutes) for this meeting. After the configured duration the meeting (room) will be closed automatically. If all participants left before the the time runs out or a moderator actively finishes the meeting the room will be closed as well.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob externe Gäste mit Ein: Specify whether users with an invitation link can attend the meeting as moderator.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob Benutzer mit Einladun: Specify whether users with an invitation link can attend the meeting as guests.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob Gäste und Teilnehmend: Decide if guests and participants can join the meeting directly or if a moderator has to approve every join.
en.Ankündigungen aus dem Kurs auf leerer Be: News of the course on an empty introductory slide
en.Ankündigungen aus Stud.IP auf leerer Beg: News of Stud.IP on an empty introductory slide
en.Wenn aktiv, so wird den Mentor:innen die: If activated, mentors will see the option to start a recording automatically and they will be able to start, stop or pause a recording manually.
en.Standardwert für die Konferenzraum-Einst: Default value for the meeting room setting 'Start recording automatically'.
en.Virtueller Raum, mit dem Live-Online-Tre: Virtual room with which live online meeting, courses and video conferences can be held. Participants can hear each other during a conference and, via a connected webcam, see and work with each other, if available. Slides can be presented and queries can be carried out. A window in the user interface of one's own computer can be made visible to others in order to show certain websites or applications to the participants, for example. In addition, the course can be recorded and made available to interested parties.
en.Face-to-face-Kommunikation mit Adobe Con: Face-to-face communication with Adobe Connect or BigBlueButton
en.Videokonferenz- und Veranstaltungsmöglic: Video conferencing and event facility;Present live on the web and draw and work together;Communication via microphone and camera;Ideal for decentralised learning and working groups;Linking to already existing own rooms
en.Derzeit finden keine Meetings in den geb: Currently no meetings are planned in your courses.
en.Um Leistungsprobleme zu vermeiden, ist d: To avoid performance issues, this feature is permanently disabled for administrators.
en.Der ausgewählte Server ist in diesem Ver: The selected server is no available for this course type.
en.Unzureichende Berechtigungen zum Ausführ: Insufficient permissions to perform this action

en.Durchführung und Verwaltung von Live-Onl: Conduct and manage live online meetings, events and video conferencing. Face-to-face communication can be used to bridge distances, external experts can be involved and students can be accompanied in projects and internships.
